website_summaries.verdict: Elegant and made from high quality material, these charms will last though many wine-filled evenings.
pros: Charms are the ideal size: small enough to fit on the glass and large enough to see what each charm is
Silver charms look elegant and not tacky
The clasp is simple but stays attached securely to the glass
Each charm is detailed with black paint to make the design stand out
cons: Charms arrive mixed together in a bag – not ideal for storage

customer_reviews.title: Cutest wine charms!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! They are also very well made. They are easy to attach and detach with a thick wire and clasp. The beach theme is so fun. I have people pick which one they want.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great Host/Hostess Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to think of an item to include in my host/hostess gift for a couple who makes their own wine. These were perfect for that. They came in a cluster in a plastic bag within the box — so nothing fancy or gifty in that respect — but the little charms were cute and complemented my themed gift nicely.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: The charms were very cute and a good size, but they came packaged in a baggie ...
customer_reviews.text: The charms were very cute and a good size, but they came packaged in a baggie in a largish box -- with no "nice" way to store them for the next usage.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good charms, poor presentation and damaged box
customer_reviews.text: The actual wine charms are pretty, true to picture, and a good size. However, they come loose in a plastic bag inside the box. Additionally, the blue and white striped box came super damaged - four of the eight corners were smushed in or bent, and one edge was ripped and hanging out. Embarrassing to give as a gift!! If you are buying for yourself and don't care about the packaging, the charms themselves are very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced for decent selection of beach themed charms - very cool!
customer_reviews.text: I was long over-due to get some of these! We recently bought a house on the lake, so I had to go with the Beach Themed set. The charms are all cute and fun beach-related themed. Cute and good conversation starters. Reasonably priced. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: One lost in the first hour.
customer_reviews.text: The one sided charms do not sit well on the stem. The way the charms are mounted on the ring they do not lie flat. Very cheaply made. You get what you pay for. The first charm that I used, the sea shell, would not lie flat and kept falling off. I am sure that they will all be lost or broken by Labor Day.
customer_reviews.author: ETMJ

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Oh so cute and so durable. The detail on the charms is quite impressive and they are the perfect size. I’ve seem some charms that are just too big and I don’t like that. I bought them for a gift and they are so perfect I plan on getting some for myself.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: They work on mugs too!! My family would get a clean mug every time they wanted a drink because they couldn’t remember which one was theirs. Now they know where their mug is at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend

product_meta.title: 10 Piece Beach Themed Wine Charm Set
product_meta.description:
If you have ever had that awkward moment trying to figure out who that glass of wine belonged to, then we have the solution for you. 

Bring the beach to your next glass of wine (but without getting any sand in your glass). With ten unique shapes, your friends will envy your tastes in wine glass decorations while feeling confident everyone knows which wine glass is their glass. 

There are enough shapes that everyone gets to pick a shape they like. 
-Conch shell
-Sea turtle 
-Starfish 
-Sailboat 
-Sea horse 
-Tropical fish 
-Clam shell 
-Palm tree 
-Sun glasses 
-Margarita 

Each charm has a gorgeous antique silver color, made of zinc alloy, and connected to a 30mm x 25mm silver colored hoop. 

These charms make great gifts, prizes, and giveaways for wine tastings, dinner parties, an evening with a friend, weddings, and bachelorette parties. Makes the perfect gift for a wine lover friend, family member, or even yourself.
feature_bullets: Add a touch of the beach to your next party or wine tasting.
Don't lose track whose glass that is. We all know that they can look the same.
Ten unique shapes each bring the beach to your next gathering.
Perfect gift for weddings, bachelorette parties, or wine lovers in your life.
Have enough shapes for enjoying a glass by yourself or when hosting larger dinner parties.
